attributes.action: For Lincoln Lawson to be allowed to remain in the U.K.
attributes.additional_details:
Lincoln & I have been married for over 10 years, he is an honest, reliable, hard-working man who is a dedicated husband and a fantastic father to our 4 children. Despite this, his right to remain in the UK is in jeopardy and he may be forced to leave which would obviously cause much heartache and upset for our family. Please sign this petition to show your support for him to be granted permission to stay.
Thank you.

rejection.details: This concerns a personal issue - an individual case.
